name: Robber Rules!
description:
Robber Rules! Is a fast paced, challenging runner game - play as a Robber whose botched robbery attempt leads to him getting chased through a bank by a hoard of furious policemen. Weave your way through the bank as you punch pesky people out the way, break down doors, but be careful of those security lasers. Run through a security laser without your protective shield and you get caught - mistime a punch or kick and the police draw closer . . .

Will you escape the bank?
